item.title: Dotfiles Setup Initiated!
item.description: Recently, I initiated my dotfiles setup. And still, it is not fully furshined. I'll keep updating it as per my requirements and this blog post is here to share the same.
item.dc:creator: Shiva Saxena

item.title: Manage Passwords With KeePassXC
item.description: In this world of internet and social accounts, it is impossible to survive without password managers (except if you use same password across all the platforms, but that sounds risky!). So, if you haven't selected your password manager so far, then KeePassXC would be really handy to work with.
item.dc:creator: Shiva Saxena

item.title: The Ultimate Vim Configuration
item.description: Are you a Vim user, and searching for some awesome tweaks that would make your text editing more efficient and delightful? If yes, then I would like to share with you the ultimate vim configurations that I found out recently.
item.dc:creator: Shiva Saxena
